key: 3/4 lb potato, peeled, cut into 1-inch cubes
1/2 cup red onion, chopped (or more to taste)
3-4 boneless skinless chicken breasts, slice into pieces about 3 inch sq
4 long hot red pepper, unseeded, sliced
2/3 cup granulated sugar (more or less, adjust to taste)
buttermilk, as needed to desired texture
1 1/2 cups butter (I have not tried this with margarine I do not like using it)
500 g of your favourite rice (like egg fried rice or pilau rice)
2 (8 ounce) packages flour tortillas (8- or 10 pkg)
1 cup blue cheese (crumbed, may use the other British variety of Stilton)
1 teaspoon lemon zest, grated (or 2-3 drops lemon oil)
3 cups chopped apples (I used 3 med apples and 1 pear)
1/2 cup low mositure part-skim mozzarella cheese, shredded
40 garlic cloves, from about 3 to 4 large heads outer papery skins removed, cloves separated and unpeeled (about 8 ounces)
6 tablespoons slivered almonds, blanched or almonds, blanched, ground
1 cucumber, peeled and cut in slivers
3/4 cup frozen blueberries or 3/4 cup frozen strawberries, etc, your choice
8 ounces cream cheese, thinned slightly w/additional milk
3 boneless skinless chicken breast halves, diced
grated chocolate (or can use chopped nuts)
1 cup mayonnaise (adding more after tossing with salad ingredients for more creaminess if desired)
1/2 teaspoon dried basil (can use fresh if you have it)
150 ml natural yoghurt or 150 ml Greek yogurt
5 cups watermelon, seeded and cubed (as sweet a melon as you can get)
8 ounces mozzarella cheese (cut into 6 thick slices)
1 cup natural-style peanut butter (no added sugar or salt)
4 (397 g) cans boiling water (use milk can)
salt and pepper (careful here, your stock already contains some salt)
2 teaspoons shortening or 2 teaspoons cooking oil
6 large carrots, peeled and cut in slices of 3/4 inch
4 stalks celery, cut into 2 inch lengths
4 cups fresh tomatoes (peeled, or use canned Italian plum tomatoes)
2 teaspoons lime juice (from about 2 medium limes)
3/4 cup blueberry jam, warmed in the microwave for 10-15 seconds
1 cup cheddar cheese, shredded, I like Mexican blend
1 egg, hard boiled cut in forths
3/4 cup milk (a bit more if using whole wheat flour)
1/4 cup pickled jalapeno pepper, diced (you can adjust this amount based on how spicy you like it)
2 cups pinto beans, fully cooked and drained
2 heads garlic, outer skin removed, cut in half
8 ounces chilled cream cheese, do not use whipped
1 lb boneless pork, in 1 inch cubes
1/3 cup fresh blueberries (thawed) or 1/3 cup frozen blueberries (thawed)
4 pieces mozzarella string cheese, cut in half
salted butter (lightly spread over bun halves)
3 (8 ounce) cans pitted black olives, drained
1/2 lb uncooked shrimp, cleaned, shelled, deveined
1/2 cup ground flax seeds (or any mix of ground seeds i.e. pumpkin, sesame, etc)
1 cup sharp cheddar cheese or 1 cup gruyere cheese, 4 ounces shredded
2 scallions, white part only, trimmed and split lengthwise
4 portabello mushrooms, thin sliced (4 slices each, 1-2 large slices per sandwich)
